content.query:
USE logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go 

select top(100)
    vtrip.year, vtrip.month, 
    convert(date,vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime) as trip_date,
    tz.Borough,
    cl.day_name as trip_day,
    (case when cl.day_name in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Y' else 'N' end ) as weekend_ind,
    sum(case when pt.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card' then 1 else 0 end) as card_trips_count,
    sum(case when pt.payment_type_desc = 'Cash' then 1 else 0 end) as cash_trips_count,
    sum(case when tt.trip_type_desc = 'Dispatch' then 1 else 0 end) as count_Dispatch_trips,
    sum(case when tt.trip_type_desc = 'Street-hail' then 1 else 0 end) as count_Street_hail_trips,
    sum(vtrip.trip_distance) as total_trip_distance,
    sum(vtrip.fare_amount) as total_fare_amount,
    sum(DATEDIFF(minute, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime,vtrip.lpep_dropoff_datetime )) as total_duration

 from 
    silver.view_partitioning_trip_data vtrip 
    join silver.taxi_zones tz on vtrip.PULocationID = tz.LocationID 
    join silver.calendar cl on convert(date,vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime) = cl.date
    join silver.payment_type pt on vtrip.payment_type = pt.payment_type
    join silver.trip_type tt on vtrip.trip_type = tt.trip_type
    
where vtrip.year = '2021' and  vtrip.month = '07' 

group by  
    vtrip.year, vtrip.month, 
    convert(date,vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime),
    tz.Borough,
    cl.day_name    
    go
